function EP03_16()
    --.承-6【8月第2週】「乙女のカゴ」
    SaveData.Title = "乙女のカゴ"

    --//BG：ハンバーガー屋
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG001aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｆ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ After meeting up with Uran Ryuguuin in front of the station, I guided her to a hamburger place as a spot for our discussion. ]])

    MSG([[ Not very familiar with the place, Uran followed me awkwardly and sat down facing me at a table. ]])

    MSG([[ After placing the two drinks and nuggets I had bought for us on the table, we continued casual chatter for about ten minutes. ]])

    MSG([[ Then Uran stepped into the main topic. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Enough small talk, dear Erika. What is it you want to ask me?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0582.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・smile
 "I'm sorry. It had been a while since I'd seen you, so I just got carried away talking." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0583.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・normal
 "You probably guessed already, but I invited you here today to hear about Uran-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0584.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・normal
 "Could you tell me why Uran-san is so passionately opposed to coeducation?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "...If you're asking me, that means you already know about Ryugu Holdings and the traditions of the Ryuguuin family, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0585.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・normal
 "Yes. I understood why Uran-san is hostile towards men. But somehow, it doesn't quite connect for me as a reason to oppose coeducation." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0586.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・sad
 "No matter how much someone dislikes men, spending valuable school life in conflict with the boys' division... I wonder if that's really necessary." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0587.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・sad
 "We're only together for three years after all, so I don't feel it's such a serious problem..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "If Uran-sama thought conservative activities were unnecessary, she would live a freer school life." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "But she doesn't only think of herself. She continually works hard for the sake of many women." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0588.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・sad
 "M-many women, you say?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Yes. All women who find men difficult." ]])

    MSG([[ I didn't quite understand what Uran meant. ]])

    MSG([[ We only spend three years at Yuriai Private Academy. So why would that connect to saving all women who aren't comfortable around men? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Do you know that Yuriai Private Academy has long been called the ‘Maiden's Cage’?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0589.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・surprised
 "Cage? No, that's the first time I've heard that. What does it mean?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "There are various theories, but the most common one is a pun on the words ‘birdcage’ and ‘protection’." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Yuriai Private Academy is a prestigious girls' school, somewhat isolated from the metropolitan area and worldly affairs, with a strong unique character." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "It was expected to serve as a place to separate maidens from the world and protect them from harmful disasters and impurities that would negatively affect their healthy growth." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0590.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・anxious
 "So, that’s the ‘cage’ part." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It does make sense. ]])

    MSG([[ Inside that cage is a space isolated from nature. Though unable to fly freely, it’s a safe world without enemies who could harm you. ]])

    MSG([[ You can peacefully live under someone's protection or take the risk and fly out into the free sky. No one can say which is happier. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "My dear Erika, you may not understand, but there are many women who truly dislike men." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "I am one of them. I grew up under unspeakable treatment from my father and brother... I get trembling just seeing men." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "So I asked my mother to let me attend Yuriai Private Academy. Uran-sama, who has been a dear friend since childhood, is also here." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0591.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・surprised
 "I-is that the reason?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Learning about Uran's unexpected past, I found myself at a loss for words. ]])

    MSG([[ From her point of view, avoiding boys all this time, my careless proposal to merge with the boys' division must have been infuriating. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Many students at Yuriai Private Academy, like Uran-sama and myself, have their futures decided by their parents." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "While in this academy, family obligations and birth status don’t matter. No vile men either. It is a sanctuary where only maidens are allowed." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "You said ‘just three years together,’ but for us, those three years at Yuriai Private Academy are irreplaceable time." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Even though eventually we're destined to fly into the cloudy sky... we want at least those three years inside the cage to be happy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "That is the humble wish of us conservatives." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0592.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・surprised
 "A humble wish... and I..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ —I'm trying to ruin it. ]])

    MSG([[ Saying ‘just three years together’ was far too reckless. I hadn’t understood at all how important those three years at Yuriai are. ]])

    MSG([[ As Uran said, many students find their time at Yuriai a form of salvation. ]])

    MSG([[ If coeducation proceeds as it is, that salvation will be completely lost. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s why conservative students—and their representative, Uran-san—are fiercely resisting. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s not only for themselves. It’s for other girls who might choose Yuriai in the future and who share the same circumstances. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Erika, dear? Are you crying?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0593.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・surprised
 "Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Touching my cheek, I realized I was crying and hurriedly wiped the tears away with a handkerchief. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0594.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・sad
 "I-I’m sorry! Truly, I’m sorry..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I felt pathetic. I had thought that changing myself meant only good things. ]])

    MSG([[ I had shallowly believed that even if change is scary, once you do it, it leads to growth, so there's no problem. ]])

    MSG([[ What battle princess? She’s the one I should call sister. ]])

    MSG([[ I've only been looking at things from my own standpoint. I’m the worst, the biggest fool. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0026.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "I understand well why Uran-sama doesn't want to oppose you, dear Erika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0027.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "As her ‘knight’ close to her, I know you are a kindhearted person." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "But the issue of coeducation is different. This feeling cannot be compromised with anyone. I’m sorry, but this time I cannot stand by your side, dear Erika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Thank you for the nuggets. It was my first time trying them... they’re delicious." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Saying that, Uran stood up from the table. ]])

    MSG([[ Left alone, I gnawed on the now-cold nuggets and, with a foggy mind, pondered the future. ]])

    MSG([[ The conflict between coeducation supporters and conservatives was a much deeper issue than I had imagined. ]])

    MSG([[ To be honest, I want to support Uran and conservative students as an ally. ]])

    MSG([[ But if I do, that means abandoning Ouga-kun and the boys' division. ]])

    MSG([[ The boys’ division and the conservatives. Is there really no path to save both? ]])
    --//SE：着信音
PLAY_SE("SEb011.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Just then, the phone I use under the name Minato rang. It was an unknown number. Who could it be? ]])

STOP_SE("SEb011.wav")
PLAY_SE("SEb020.wav")
WAIT(100)
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0595.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・normal
 "Hello, this is Minato." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Helloooo~ It's meee<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Hehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0596.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・anxious
 "Eh!? Th-that voice!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I almost fell over at the unexpected voice. Why is this person calling my Minato number and not Erika's?! ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes Himegami】
 "Hey, let's have a night date together~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I want to talk to Mina-chan about Marika-chan<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ The caller was Hermes Himegami. An all-national idol’s sudden invitation to a date. ]])
    --　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_17")

end
